data.title: Measuring Goodhart’s Law
data.description: Goodhart’s law famously says: “When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure.” Although originally from economics, it’s something we have to grapple with at OpenAI when figuring out how to optimize objectives that are difficult or costly to measure.

data.title: What is Instance Segmentation? A Guide with Roboflow.
data.description: We are excited to release support for instance segmentation projects on Roboflow.  Instance segmentation allows your computer vision model to know the specific outline of an object in an image, unlocking new use cases for Roboflow in your application.

data.title: An empirical analysis of compute-optimal large language model training
data.description: We ask the question: “What is the optimal model size and number of training tokens for a given compute budget?” To answer this question, we train models of various sizes and with various numbers of tokens, and estimate this trade-off empirically. Our main finding is that the current large language models are far too large for their compute budget and are not being trained on enough data.

data.title: Large-Scale Matrix Factorization on TPUs
Build a custom entity recognizer for PDF documents using Amazon Comprehend
data.authors: Joshua Levy, Alex Chirayath, Andrew Ang, Boris Aronchik, Niharika Jayanthi, Jennifer Zhu
data.tags: Amazon Comprehend, Amazon ML Solutions Lab, Artificial Intelligence
data.description: In many industries, it’s critical to extract custom entities from documents in a timely manner. This can be challenging. Insurance claims, for example, often contain dozens of important attributes (such as dates, names, locations, and reports) sprinkled across lengthy and dense documents. Manually scanning and extracting such information can be error-prone and time-consuming. Rule-based software […]

data.title: Getting started with the Amazon Kendra Box connector
data.description: Amazon Kendra is a highly accurate and easy-to-use intelligent search service powered by machine learning (ML). Amazon Kendra offers a suite of data source connectors to simplify the process of ingesting and indexing your content, wherever it resides. For many organizations, Box Content Cloud is a core part of their content storage and lifecycle management […]
